request.description:
This API is used to get a particular quiz or list of all the quizzes created by this user.

You can apply date filters using to_date and from_date. it will include from_date quizzes but exclude to_date quizzes

response.name: Quiz Get with quizId
Quiz Get - list all quiz created by this user
